pages.text: $(l)$(fire)Amulet of Fire-Resistance$() - is one of the $(o)'basic'$() amulets.$(br2)$(l)USAGE$(): $(li)It provides you with fire-resistance, that becomes better every next tier (up to 4)
Tier 1:$(li)decreases damage dealt by fire by 50%$(li)by lava by 25%
Tier 2:$(li)invulnerability to fire damage$(li)decreases damage dealt by lava by 50%
Tier 3:$(li)invulnerability to fire damage$(li)decreases damage dealt by lava by 75%
Tier 4:$(li)invulnerability to all types of fire damage.$(br2)$(l)NOTE: These values may not be accurate if configuration was changed! I'm thinking about the fix
